trench.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground
trench.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Workers dug a trench for gas lines.
trench.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a long narrow valley in the ground beneath the sea
trench.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a deep trench dug in the ground as a protection for soldiers
trench.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: the trenches of World War I
